tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
full_summary:
=====================================

### Online Digital Engagement Tender Opportunity

#### Summary

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS) invites potential vendors to respond to a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of online digital engagement services.

#### Tender Information

| Field Name | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | 24062-24-283-001-001 |
| Publication Date | 2024-05-16 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-05-21T14:00:00 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2024-06-03 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2026-05-31 |
| Regions of Opportunity | National Capital Region (NCR) |

#### Tender Description

The TBS seeks to establish a contract to provide a platform software as a service for online digital engagement. Successful vendors will be required to provide a comprehensive platform to engage with Canadians and support the government's digital transformation initiatives.

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation of RFP submissions will be based on the following criteria:

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contact Information

For further information, please contact Dawn Dormer at dawn.dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca or 343-542-8102.

#### Attachments

The following attachments are available for download:

* Questions and Answers Series 4 (English)
* Questions and Answers Series 4 (French)
* Amendment 1 to RFP (English)
* Amendment 1 to RFP (French)
* RFP (English)
* RFP (French)

Please note that the tender has expired and is now closed to submissions.  If you are interested in future Public Tenders from the Government of Canada, we recommend you register with the Supplier Registration page.
